title: Stereocontrolled and time-honored access to piperidine- and pyrrolidine-fused 3-methylenetetrahydropyrans using lactam-tethered alkenols
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26913-26919
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04916K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Timothy K. Beng, Ifeyinwa S. Anosike, Jasleen Kaur
Two cascade approaches featuring bromocycloetherification-elimination or dehydrogenative cycloetherification-isomerization of lactam-tethered alkenols have facilitated the stereocontrolled synthesis of lactam-fused 3-methylenetetrahydropyrans.
